00019 OLPomdp::OLPomdp(Controller* controller, Simulator* simulator, double discount, double stepSize) : RLAlg(controller, simulator, discount, stepSize) {};

00029 double OLPomdp::doSteps(Vector& totalRewards, int steps, bool learn) {
00030 
00031 
00032     Vector action(simulator->getActionDim());
00033     Vector rewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00034     Vector reinforcement(simulator->getRewardDim());
00035     
00036     totalRewards.clear();
00037 
00038 
00039     for (int s = 0; s < steps; s++) {
00040         // Must do next line before calling getAction() since
00041         // getAction will accumulate log action gradients into the
00042         // trace directly for efficiency.
00043         if (learn && obs.getSteps()>0) controller->discountTrace();
00044         obs.setSteps(obs.getSteps()+1);
00045         simulator->getObservation(obs);
00046 
00047         simulator->getReward(rewards);
00048         controller->getAction(obs, action, learn);
00049         if (simulator->doAction(action) != 0) break; 
00050 
00051         // If the rewards are for the curret state, we get the reward for the new state here.
00052         // Otherwise, if the reward is state, action, we get the reward for the transition just completed.
00053         // Finally, if it's state, action, next state, then that's here too, but the observation is unknown
00054         // till we get to the next step.
00055 
00056         totalRewards += rewards;
00057         if (learn) {
00058             reinforcement.assign(rewards - baseline);
00059             // [daa] Moved the check for 0 reward to the controller level
00060             //controller->instantStep(reinforcement, obs);
00061             controller->instantStep(rewards);
00062         }
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     totalRewards /= steps;
00069     return inner_prod(totalRewards, scalar_vector<double>(simulator->getRewardDim(), 1.0))/simulator->getRewardDim();
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 }
